tweets.text:
There is 10 times more coral reef on the planet than chalk streams. 

The River Wandle is one of only two urban chalk streams in London.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TSHThMTasv
@eddiemair @darrenadam @TomSwarbrick1 how can this be allowed to happen ?? https://t.co/9j1w5wtNfC

So @bbcmtd @BBC @BBCNews @BBCRadio4 Thank You for telling the story of #WalleysQuarrey STINK. This is an @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids EMERGENCY and the health and wellbeing of our TOWN is at stake. We Live In Hope #lestwedie @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: @theJeremyVine Thanks for highlighting the Silverdale Stink!It’s toxic, @EnvAgencyMids & @PHE_uk disaster that’s getting worse by the day the nausea,the sort throats,the breathing issues it’s out of control- no comment from @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #JeremyVine

@philmackie @joe9tee @BBCr4today @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews @bbc5live Thank you SO SO SO SO MUCH. living with this night and day is a living hell. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids must take immediate and emergency action. Thank you for telling our story.

urls.title: The Role of Behavioral Ecotoxicology in Environmental Protection
urls.description: For decades, we have known that chemicals affect human and wildlife behavior. Moreover, due to recent technological and computational advances, scientists are now increasingly aware that a wide variety of contaminants and other environmental stressors adversely affect organismal behavior and subsequent ecological outcomes in terrestrial and aquatic ecosystems. There is also a groundswell of concern that regulatory ecotoxicology does not adequately consider behavior, primarily due to a lack of standardized toxicity methods. This has, in turn, led to the exclusion of many behavioral ecotoxicology studies from chemical risk assessments. To improve understanding of the challenges and opportunities for behavioral ecotoxicology within regulatory toxicology/risk assessment, a unique workshop with international representatives from the fields of behavioral ecology, ecotoxicology, regulatory (eco)toxicology, neurotoxicology, test standardization, and risk assessment resulted in the formation of

tweets.text:
https://t.co/tAQi2AEuxS

tweets.text:
We're continuing to support our partners @shropsfire @WMerciaPolice @HighwaysWMIDS @TelfordWrekin @PHE_WestMids with the fire at a former waste site in Wellington #Telford 

Our officers are also monitoring the water quality downstream of the fire for impacts on the environment https://t.co/ENwOSBKpoz

The coarse fish close season runs until 15th June inclusive. This means it’s illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers.

Don’t forget, there are plenty of still waters or canal coarse fisheries where you can fish. 

Learn more: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB https://t.co/9Tpaa6XWIW
